entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 4:54 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
